snippet.title: Boy hit by car near school
snippet.content:
A BOY was taken to hospital today after being hit by a car outside a Sunshine Coast primary school.
Police said the boy, believed to be 10-years-old, was hit outside Buddina State School about 3.05pm.
He was taken to Sunshine Coast University Hospital with minor injuries where he remained late yesterday in a stable condition.
